00009 #pragma once
00010 #ifndef __X2D_EXCEPTIONS_H__
00011 #define __X2D_EXCEPTIONS_H__
00012 
00013 #include <exception>
00014 
00015 namespace x2d {
00016 namespace base {
00017 
00021     class sys_exception
00022     : public std::exception
00023     {
00024     public:
00028         sys_exception(const std::string& msg) throw()
00029         : msg_(msg)
00030         {            
00031         }
00032         
00033         virtual ~sys_exception() throw()
00034         {            
00035         }
00036         
00037         const char* what() const throw()
00038         {
00039             return msg_.c_str();
00040         }
00041         
00042     private:
00043         std::string     msg_;
00044     };
00045     
00049     class config_exception
00050     : public sys_exception
00051     {    
00052     public:
00053         config_exception(const std::string& msg)
00054         : sys_exception(msg)
00055         {            
00056         }
00057     };
00058 
00062     class parse_exception
00063     : public config_exception
00064     {        
00065     public:
00066         parse_exception(const std::string& msg)
00067         : config_exception("[x2d config parsing]: " + msg)
00068         {            
00069         }
00070     };
00071 
00075     class structure_exception
00076     : public config_exception
00077     {    
00078     public:
00079         structure_exception(const std::string& msg)
00080         : config_exception("[x2d config structure]: " + msg)
00081         {            
00082         }
00083     };
00084     
00085 } // namespace base
00086 } // namespace x2d
00087 using namespace x2d::base;

00089 #endif // __X2D_EXCEPTIONS_H__
